attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: I had very high hopes for this app. When I downloaded it I got weird pop ups, I’ve never had this happen before. I ignored them and opened the app. When I opened the app I was very disappointed. It was very glitchy and very unorganized, I do not recommend this app.

attributes.title: terrible quality and stole my money!!!
attributes.review: I got this app to keep up with updates of our racist, homophobic, sexist, and transphobic president and it instantly starting stealing my apple money! I am furious to say the least, they stole over 50 dollars of MY ITunes money. I do not recommend this app to anyone!!!!!

attributes.title: Breaks phone
attributes.review: This app constantly crashes and makes phone glitch out since I got it! It is absolutely terrible just like Trump and he should know to put out something better than that. If you want to keep your phone safe DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP and rate 0 stars.

attributes.title: I hate u
attributes.review: I’m trying to get this app to one star review and this is what you get Donald Trump for trying to take a TikTok down some famous TickTocker  told me to write this one star so if you take our app then we take your app down I hate u Donald Trump you racist cracker and Black Lives Matter and so does TickTock

attributes.title: The app
attributes.review: The app took 3 days to download and it kept asking for my credit card information and that is very inappropriate also the banning of the app tic tok is very bad because it is the only app that has kept kids from doing bad things.

attributes.title: Terrible !
attributes.review: I got it for my grandma bc she’s a trump supporter (i am not) but after downloading her phone battery started dying so fast, after just 10-15 minutes on the app. Her phone battery is now permanently damaged after I spent 800 dollars on getting her a new phone 🙃

attributes.title: Nah I’m good
attributes.review: This crap just don’t work right keeps glitching getting updates later than they come out and the notifications don’t go off not only that I think that this app is more useless than anything else in the app store

attributes.title: Suuuuper Buggy
attributes.review: This app is super buggy. Kept crashing and saying I need to update even though my phone is brand new and has plenty of storage. Won’t let me click on more than a couple links without shutting down.

attributes.title: NASTY
attributes.review:
This app is awful 
I would NOT recommend. As soon as I got it I started hearing his voice and seeing orange. I thought I was just imagining it but after I decided to delete the app it all stopped. If you don’t want a similar experience I would suggest not to download.
